Name: Fires (Last 24 Hours)
Description: 1km MODIS fire detections in the last 24 hour period compiled by USDA Forest Service MODIS Active Fire Mapping Program  from MODIS data acquired by USDA Forest Service RSAC, NASA GSFC Rapid Response, Univ of Wisconsin SSEC, Univ of Alaska-Fairbanks and NASA GSFC Direct Readout Laboratory.
